entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 4:17PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...SLICK ROADS POSSIBLE FOR WEDNESDAY MORNING COMMUTE... As temperatures climb into the 30s and 40s this afternoon, melting snow has resulted in water collecting on area roads. Temperatures will drop into the 20s overnight, causing water on the roads to refreeze and form an icy surface. This may result in hazardous conditions, especially during the Wednesday morning commute.

entry.summary: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING FOR SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTY...
